name: Scope Todo
description:
Ever do your affinitizing and sequencing work in FigJam only to export your tasks to another tool? Why can't you do your planning and task management in FigJam?


Scope Todo lets you manage your shaping work in FigJam, end-to-end.


  • Separate your todos into separate scopes
  • Connect scopes to keep track of what work comes next
  • Keep out-of-scope todos around by moving them into the "Out-of-Scope" section.


Learn more about affinitizing, sequencing & scoping ->
